rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Garage Access
rooms.description: A modest foyer leading directly to a two-car garage integrated into the facade, with Vastu considerations emphasizing the use of light materials for entry.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area (Open-plan)
rooms.description: An open living space that combines art deco elements such as geometric patterns and bold colors. The area includes a dining alcove, with a central focal point inspired by vintage Art Deco motifs.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area. Designed for efficiency with art deco fixtures, high-gloss surfaces, and integrated appliances.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom & Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bedroom designed as a guest suite complete with an ensuite bathroom. Minimalist design aligns with bachelor pad aesthetics while adhering to local norms and Vastu principles for rest.

openings.description: Large glass windows integrated into the kitchen and living areas for natural light, oriented according to Vastu guidelines.
